definition: Lavrov (name)/Sergey Viktorovich Lavrov (1950-), Russian diplomat and politician, Foreign minister from 2004
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Lavrov indicated that the Russian side feels satisfactory with the development of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 拉夫羅夫表示，俄方對兩國關係的發展感到滿意。

sentences.english: Lavrov thanked President Hu for meeting with him.
sentences.chinese: 拉夫羅夫感謝胡錦濤主席的會見。

sentences.english: But Lavrov notes the firm U.S. intention to establish the system.
sentences.chinese: 但是，拉夫羅夫特別指出美國建立這個系統的決心。

sentences.english: Lavrov said after Medvedev in the state expressed satisfaction with the island tour.
sentences.chinese: 拉夫羅夫說，梅德韋傑夫對在國後島的行程表示滿意。
